name: Magische Recherche Demo
description:
Magische Recherche - or Magical Research is an urban fantasy visual novel sets in Flanders, Belgium.  Miles is far away from home, yet the distance doesn't seem to leave the mysticism that he grew out of. Except they're different and threatens his way out of his normal daily life. He has to seek the others, friends, to band together and solve the mystery that soon swallows the school. In a strange country, different lives and people, he might find at home here.. if he survives.

In this Demo is the prologue of Magische Recherche consist of 2 parts, where Miles meets the strange for the first time, and the sneak peak for the people that would be part of his journey.

Developer's note:

This is the first game developed by NF,  taken from undetermined/unfinished/on-hold work of novel with the same name. This demo might be perceived as a way to "test the waters", showing what can be achieved with  developer's current skills. Previous works only focused on writing and illustrations. Recent years into gaming, and as a first timer in game developing, developer is looking forward to create more projects. Feel free to contact in terms of project and collaboration.
